snippet: Former President George Bush broke a bone in his neck in a fall at his home in Kennebunkport on Wednesday, his official spokesman said.
abstract: Former Pres George H W Bush breaks bone in his neck after falling at his Kennebunkport, Me, home.
lead_paragraph: Former President George Bush broke a bone in his neck in a fall at his home in Kennebunkport on Wednesday, his official spokesman said.

headline.main: Former President George Bush Breaks Bone in Neck
headline.print_headline: Maine: George H. W. Bush Breaks Bone in His Neck
